data.title: Tours to Colmar: what to see. Guide with prices for vacations
data.meta_description: Useful information: excursions, interesting places for rest, cost of entertainment in Colmar. What is important to know - about prices for documents, renting a car or bicycle.
data.text:
The name of this town in northeastern France might be confused with the name of a cephalopod. But this is a misleading impression. Those who get to know this marvelous area will appreciate all its virtues.

The best way to tour Colmar is by car, getting to know Champagne, the Ardennes, Lorraine and the Haut-Rhin. These are the places that are famous for their incredible nature and marvelous architecture. On the way you will meet bright half-timbered houses and incredible landscapes.

That is why buying hot trip it is better to postpone until a long vacation, and we will help you find a route for departure to Colmar. The most convenient option will be to fly to Strasbourg.

Cost of tickets with departure from Kiev from 227 EUR. The lowest price will be offered by Lufthansa. You have to make a connection on the way. There are also options with AirFranceand KLM.

Further, you need to calculate the budget for your tour of the region. Cheap car rentals can be found from companies that provide cars at the airport. Rates start at 45 EUR.

And don't forget to include the trip one of the fundamental points is accommodation. Inexpensiveholiday in Colmar offer hostels and hotels two stars. You need to pay about 50 EUR.

Based on all of the above, you can organize your own hot tour. You should start from the sum of 1200 EUR for two people. The calculation is for seven days' accommodation, flight for two and car rental.
